name: Movylo Marketing Automation
author: movylo

sections.description:
Automated Customer Engagement and Sales Booster for local businesses.
Build your Customer List by capturing leads from your WordPress website (and also from Facebook, GMB, Instagram, and many more) and then automatically convert the list into real sales (in-store and/or online) with Movylo.
Movylo will help your business achieve the following results:

  1. build and grow your own Customer List, by capturing customers from many sources (website, social accounts,…);
  2. automatically nurture the Customer List with the Movylo AutoPilot (marketing automation), to help you engage with customers;
  3. create your own loyalty program, newsletters, coupons, offers and messages to send to customers;
  4. close more sales in-store and/or online

Video

Check our video here
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate the plugin (make sure that you do it if you already have a Movylo account);
  2. Log in into your Movylo account and click on “Find new customers” => “Via Website” and get your API credentials;
  3. Enter the credentials into the plugin configuration to connect the Movylo web widget to your WordPress site;
  4. You are all set! On your website you will now see a widget that will help you capture customers and grow the list. As soon as customers are captured the Autopilot will kick in and increase your customers’ engagement.
sections.faq: Check the FAQs here www.movylo.com/faq/
